statements: UPDATE ChordProgressions SET emotion = 'happy' WHERE progression_id = 1;
UPDATE ChordProgressions SET chord_progression = 'I-IV-V' WHERE progression_id = 2;
UPDATE ChordProgressions SET chord_progression = 'I - IV - V - I', emotion = 'Happy' WHERE progression_id = 1;
UPDATE ChordProgressions SET emotion = 'Sad', chord_progression = 'ii - V - I' WHERE progression_id = 2;
UPDATE ChordProgressions SET name = 'Blues Progression' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EmotionalEffects SET intensity = 5, effect = 'Soothing' WHERE progression_id = 1;
UPDATE ChordProgressions SET chords = ARRAY['Am', 'Dm', 'Em'] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EmotionalEffects SET intensity = 2, effect = 'Euphoria' WHERE progression_id = 1;
UPDATE chord_progressions SET progression = 'I - IV - V' WHERE name = 'Classic Progression'
UPDATE emotional_effects SET description = 'Produces a sense of joy and satisfaction' WHERE effect_name = 'Happiness'
UPDATE chord_progressions SET name = 'Pop Song' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE emotional_effects SET description = 'Creates a joyful vibe' WHERE effect_name = 'Happy'
UPDATE Chords SET chord_name='Major Triad', chord_type='Triad' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Emotions SET description='Feeling of happiness and joy' WHERE emotion_name='Happy';
UPDATE Chords SET chord_name = 'Major', root_note = 'C', chord_type = 'Triad', musical_key = 'C Major', emotion_effect = 'Happy' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Emotions SET emotion_name = 'Joy', description = 'Feeling of great pleasure and happiness' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Chords SET chord_name = 'Minor7' WHERE chord_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE EmotionalEffects SET intensity = 8, positive = FALSE WHERE effect_id = '2187f0cb-e4da-46c8-b3a2-eeb36244b6e6';
UPDATE Chords SET chord_name = 'Updated Major', root_note = 'G', chord_type = 'Major', description = 'Updated description' WHERE chord_id = 'f8bb8da1-7b28-447f-b7e1-4733503ffd49';
UPDATE ProgressionEffects SET impact = 0.75 WHERE progression_id = '906c9f5b-9976-4c7c-b317-0892a1be0fa4' AND effect_id = '957f6438-8893-4681-912c-4f7e0092bab3';
